title: Cup And Saucer
dimensions:
H x diam. (saucer): 2.7 x 11.7 cm (1 1/16 x 4 5/8 in.)
H x diam. (cup): 4.1 x 6.8 cm (1 5/8 x 2 11/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of the C. Helme and Alice B. Strater Collection
description: White glass with painted decoration.  Red and blue bird central figure on saucer.
